description: Stay warm and fashionable even in the coldest of temperatures with the Long Long winter coat. It's filled with top-quality, eco-friendly, and traceable down that's RDS-certified, ensuring exceptional warmth in temperatures as low as -20°C. The quilted shell is made entirely from recycled waxed nylon, providing windproof, breathable, and water-repellent protection. This long coat comes with a hood, elastic wrist cuffs, and snap-fastening sides, making it perfect for adapting to the changing conditions of winter.
name: Long Long Jacket - Womens

specs.value: RDS-certified gray duck down - 60% down - 40% feather, fill power of 600
